>
[Basic Trickery](/Feats.aspx?ID=5093) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>

</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Player Core](/Sources.aspx?ID=216) pg. 221 <sup>2.0</sup>

</column>

---

You gain a 1st- or 2nd-level [rogue feat](/Feats.aspx?Traits=139).

<title level="2">Basic Trickery leads to...</title>
[Advanced Trickery](/Feats.aspx?ID=5095)
name: Basic Trickery
